controller

Class RuleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.RuleController

  • public class RuleController
extends java.lang.Object
    The ruleController controls, and handles the events created when a rule is selected from the menu, or creating a new rule. This class is initialized in MainController
    Author:
    Kent Erlend Bratteng Knudsen
